Ğ˜Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ±Ğ° Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ, ĞµÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ñƒ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ñ ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ÑŒÑ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ¹Ñ‚Ñ‹

This game has its faults: pay to play for killers, an insane amount of grinding to get prestige level 3 on the characters you prefer with the perks you want, and extremely broken hitboxes, but I will forever love this game no matter it's current faults because there just isn't another game on the market quite like it.   I hope one day they will fix the hitboxes and make the pay to play aspect less detrimental.  To put it in perspective, at the time of this review I have over 600 hours in the game and I have only 1 prestige3 survivor, with most my survivors at level 40, 4 killers level 40, and 1 other survivor p2.  So basically I have only 1 character fully leveled with most the perks I want at 600 hours, which is ridiculous .  The grindy nature of the game makes it very difficult to get friends to play with me, because they're nowhere near the threshold to a leveled up survivor or killer with the perks they want.  I just want to make everybody aware of the faults before they dive into this game, but with all that being said, it's extremely fun and addicting and I highly recommend it.

Recomendado, es un juego muy pero muy divertido si tienes minimo un amigo para jugarlo, es pay to win y eso que el juego es de paga pero realmente si no piensas en eso casi no te das cuenta. 7/10

Good game, id recommend buying IF you're not on Linux.

[h1] Please Support Linux [/h1]

Mechanics are never clearly explained for most actions and perks. You can't tell how a killer handles and how his mechanics function unless you play him which requires buying DLC for a game you've already bought. BBQ n Chilli is a big pile of horseshit that every killer runs that can't be countered at all. Most items/addons are worthless or incredibly situational to the point where its not even worth running them.

Despite being released 4 years ago they still only have two emotes to communicate objectives and gameplans to your team which about sums it up really. Teammate's perks are completely obfuscated from each survivor for no apparent reason. 

Buy if you want to be frustrated at every turn.

At first, I wasn't so sure I would like it because I am more of a MMORPG fan and not so much interactive games, however I absolutely LOVE this game. The characters are amazing, and the perks are fun. i like the bloodweb and the challenge of having to get the best perks when the entity is unleashed at Level 10. Thanks for making such a great game! i highly recommend it!

Great fun for the money. I'm really surprised with how great this game turned out to be!
A nice horror game but need to add more elements to make the game more interesting. I feel a bit boring after playing for a while. Overall, good game, worth buying on sale

It's an overall very entertaining game, I got bored of it really quickly as i don't have many friends who play it but I would recommend it to anyone. Although there are a few downsides, as soon as you get half decent at the game and begin to learn how to doge the killer, most killers rage quit very quickly which results in your victory. Sure it's free currency but  it's not entertaining at all. Downside number 2 is that the waiting cue for the killer on the servers i play on is on average 4.42 minutes, this has been adressed in the past and made somewhat better and i know that the devs plan on improving matchmaking in future but it is still something you should keep in mind if you plan on playing a lot of killer.
Hit boxes definitely need more balance in my opinion. Effortless lock on strikes.
It's really great when you playing this game with your friends.
